sen.j: 中田 錦吉（なかた きんきち、元治元年12月9日 (旧暦)（1865年1月6日） - 大正15年（1926年）2月20日）は、第四代住友総理事である。
sen.e: Kinkichi NAKATA (6 January, 1865 - 20 February) was the fourth chief director of Sumitomo.
Kinkichi NAKATA (January 6, 1865 - February 20, 1926) was the fourth chief director of Sumitomo.
sen.cmt: 日付の変更をしました。
sen.e: Kinkichi NAKATA (January 6, 1865 - February 20, 1926) was the fourth chief director of Sumitomo.

sen.j: 出羽国大館（秋田県）出身。
sen.e: He was born in Odate, Dewa Province (currently Akita Prefecture).
He was born in Odate, Dewa Province (currently Akita Prefecture).
He was born in Odate, Dewa Province (currently Akita Prefecture).

sen.j: 明治23年（1890年）東京大学卒業。
sen.e: He graduated from the University of Tokyo in 1890.
He graduated from the University of Tokyo in 1890.
He graduated from the University of Tokyo in 1890.

sen.j: 同年横浜始審裁判所判事に任官。
sen.e: He was appointed as a judge of Yokohama District Court.
He was appointed as a judge of Yokohama District Court.
He was appointed as a judge of Yokohama District Court.

sen.j: 東京控訴院判事、横浜地方裁判所部長、水戸地方裁判所所長、東京控訴院部長を経て、明治33年（1900年）大学の3年先輩である鈴木馬左也の推挽によって住友に入り、明治35年（1902年）別子鉱業所支配人となる。
sen.e: After working as a judge of Tokyo Appellate Court, a department director of Yokohama District Court, an office manager of Mito District Court and a department director of Tokyo Appellate Court, he joined Sumitomo with help from Masaya SUZUKI in 1902 and became a manager of Besshi Mining Company in 1902.

After working as a judge of Tokyo Appellate Court, a department director of Yokohama District Court, an office manager of Mito District Court and a department director of Tokyo Appellate Court, he joined Sumitomo with help from Masaya SUZUKI in 1902 and became the manager of Besshi Mining Company in 1902.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞の変更をしました。
sen.e: After working as a judge of Tokyo Appellate Court, a department director of Yokohama District Court, an office manager of Mito District Court and a department director of Tokyo Appellate Court, he joined Sumitomo with help from Masaya SUZUKI in 1902 and became the manager of Besshi Mining Company in 1902.

sen.j: 明治36年（1903年）本店理事となり、明治42年（1909年）商工視察のため欧米へ出張し、明治43年（1910年）からは銀行支配人を兼務した。
sen.e: When he became a director of the head office in 1903, he went on a business trip to Europe and America to learn about commerce in 1909 and began working concurrently as a bank manager in 1910.
When he became a director of the head office in 1903, he went on a business trip to Europe and America to learn about commerce in 1909 and began working concurrently as a bank manager in 1910.
When he became a director of the head office in 1903, he went on a business trip to Europe and America to learn about commerce in 1909 and began working concurrently as a bank manager in 1910.

sen.j: 明治45年（1912年）銀行を株式会社に改組し、その実質的トップである常務取締役を兼務した。
sen.e: When the bank was reorganized into a joint-stock company, he worked concurrently as a managing director which was considered as the head of the organization.
When the bank was reorganized into a joint-stock company, he worked concurrently as a managing director which was considered as the head of the organization.
When the bank was reorganized into a joint-stock company, he worked concurrently as a managing director which was considered as the head of the organization.

sen.j: 大正4年（1915年）鋳鋼所（住友金属の前身）、大正8年（1919年）には大阪北港（住友土地工務の前身）、大正9年（1920年）電線（現、住友電工）・日本電気の各取締役に就任した。
sen.e: He was appointed as a director of Casting Company (later known as Sumitomo Metal) in 1915, Osaka Hokko (later known as Sumitomo Tochi Komu) in 1919 and Electric Wiring (later known as Sumitomo Electric Industries) NEC Cooperation in 1920.

He was appointed as the director of Casting Company (later known as Sumitomo Metal) in 1915, Osaka Hokko (later known as Sumitomo Tochi Komu) in 1919 and Electric Wiring (later known as Sumitomo Electric Industries) NEC Cooperation in 1920.
sen.cmt: 定冠詞の変更をしました。
sen.e: He was appointed as the director of Casting Company (later known as Sumitomo Metal) in 1915, Osaka Hokko (later known as Sumitomo Tochi Komu) in 1919 and Electric Wiring (later known as Sumitomo Electric Industries) NEC Cooperation in 1920.

sen.j: 大正11年（1922年）鈴木馬左也の後をついで住友合資総理事に就任。
sen.e: In 1922, he became the chief manager of Sumitomo, Ltd. after the retirement of Masaya SUZUKI.
In 1922, he became the chief manager of Sumitomo, Ltd. after Masaya SUZUKI retired.
sen.cmt: 内容の変更をしました。
sen.e: In 1922, he became the chief manager of Sumitomo, Ltd. after Masaya SUZUKI retired.

sen.j: 大正13年（1924年）北海道の坂炭坑を買収し、大正14年（1925年）住友坂炭坑（住友石炭鉱業の前身）を設立。
sen.e: After purchasing a coal mine in Hokkaido, 1924, he established Sumitomo Coal Mining (later known as Sumitomo Coal Mining Co., Ltd.) in 1925.
After purchasing a coal mine in Hokkaido (1924), he established Sumitomo Coal Mining (later known as Sumitomo Coal Mining Co., Ltd.) in 1925.
sen.cmt: 日付は原文どおり括弧内に入れました。
sen.e: After purchasing a coal mine in Hokkaido (1924), he established Sumitomo Coal Mining (later known as Sumitomo Coal Mining Co., Ltd.) in 1925.

sen.j: 同年大阪市の公設市場設立に応じ、安治川の住友伸銅所（住友金属の前身）と住友倉庫の敷地約2万7000坪を同市に譲渡。
sen.e: In the same year, the land of Sumitomo Copper and Brass in Ajigawa (later known as Sumitomo Metal) and Sumitomo Warehouse 89,100 sq.m. were offered to Osaka city due to the foundation of public market.

In the same year, the land of Sumitomo Copper and Brass in Ajigawa (later known as Sumitomo Metal) and Sumitomo Warehouse 89,100 sq.m. were offered to Osaka city due to the foundation of the public market.

In the same year, the land of Sumitomo Copper and Brass in Ajigawa (later known as Sumitomo Metal) and Sumitomo Warehouse 89,100 sq.m. were offered to Osaka city due to the foundation of the public market.

sen.j: 4月には住友製品の販売店を神戸と名古屋に設置（住友商事の前身）、6月には肥料製造所（住友化学の前身）を株式会社とし、大阪の日之出生命（住友生命の前身）を買収。
sen.e: In April, the stores which handled Sumitomo products (later known as Sumitomo Corporation) were established in Kobe and Nagoya, and the reorganization of Sumitomo Fertilizer Manufacturing (later known as Sumitomo Chemicals Co., Ltd.) into a joint-stock company as well as the purchase of Hinode Life Insurance Company (later known as Sumitomo Life Insurance Company) took place in June.

In April, the stores which handled Sumitomo products (later known as Sumitomo Corporation) were established in Kobe and Nagoya, and the reorganization of Sumitomo Fertilizer Manufacturing (later known as Sumitomo Chemicals Co., Ltd.) into a joint-stock company as well as the purchase of Hinode Life Insurance Company (later known as Sumitomo Life Insurance Company) took place in June.

In April, the stores which handled Sumitomo products (later known as Sumitomo Corporation) were established in Kobe and Nagoya, and the reorganization of Sumitomo Fertilizer Manufacturing (later known as Sumitomo Chemicals Co., Ltd.) into a joint-stock company as well as the purchase of Hinode Life Insurance Company (later known as Sumitomo Life Insurance Company) took place in June.

sen.j: 7月には住友信託銀行を設立し、住友銀行、大阪商船、住友倉庫、日本電気、東亜興業などの取締役を兼任した。
sen.e: He founded Sumitomo Trust and Banking in July and worked concurrently as a director of Sumitomo Bank, O.S.K. Lines, Sumitomo Wearehosue, NEC Coporation and Toa Kogyo.
He founded Sumitomo Trust and Banking in July and worked concurrently as a director of Sumitomo Bank, O.S.K. Lines, Sumitomo Wearehosue, NEC Coporation and Toa Kogyo.
He founded Sumitomo Trust and Banking in July and worked concurrently as a director of Sumitomo Bank, O.S.K. Lines, Sumitomo Wearehosue, NEC Coporation and Toa Kogyo.
